sentences.sentence: His manner seems to have reverted to normal.
sentences.translation: 他的举止好像已经恢复了正常。

sentences.sentence: After her divorce she reverted to her maiden name.
sentences.translation: 离婚以后，她重新用起娘家的姓氏。

sentences.sentence: His hair has reverted back to its original copper hue.
sentences.translation: 他的头发恢复到了原来的铜色。
